message: Let's be fair and start with a reasonable split. I'll take a bit more since I'm making the first offer.
Your turn to be reasonable, Alice.  Let's not waste time haggling.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's meet in the middle... almost.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out with each round.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option.
